subject: Re: Short HOWTO on using git for Samba development
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Chetan,

I finally got aroujnd to reading the articles you referred to.

> Here's a (and partly uninformed) comparison  of different dvcs on
> their various flaws and features -
> http://changelog.complete.org/posts/528-Whose-Distributed-VCS-Is-The-Most-Distributed.html

This was probably the most informative but no real information.
The mpost interesting part is the comments appended to the
article.

I probably will give Mercurial a try once I figure out how
to import our cvs repo using Tailor.

I'm really starting to hate svn.



cheers, jerry
